ValidationRule.description: Can't convert lead if Account Type isn't filled out
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, IsConverted = True, ISBLANK(TEXT(Account_Type__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select an "Account Type" before you're able to convert this lead.
